Brian is Netflix Famous!

09 Sep 2021

The famous – and dangerous – Copper’s Hill Cheese Rolling race was featured in an episode of Netflix’s We Are The Champions series. Brian happened to take part in the race the year they filmed, and ended up on the episode’s cover photo.
